attributes.additional_details: As a farther that's had children removed it's heartbreaking for family's to have children removed and put up for forced adoption which is not fair on the general public.
attributes.background: Change the law so there can be no forced adoption and every child gets handed back to the parents

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Ban adoption when birth parents are alive
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715062

Review children’s services processes for removing children from their parents
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705471
